examples.title: example
examples.content:
<k-tabs
	tab="content"
	tabs="[
		{ name: 'content', label: 'Content', link: '/content' },
		{ name: 'settings', label: 'Settings', link: '/settings', badge: 3 }
	]"
/>

props.name: tab
props.description: Name of the currently active tab

props.name: tabs
props.description: List of tabs to display. Each entry must be an object with the following properties: `name`, `label`, `link`, `icon`, `badge`
